flow.text: Hello! I'm your Project Management Assistant. Press any key to continue.
What is the name of your project?
flow.hints: website, mobile app, dashboard, API, platform

flow.text: What is your role in this project?
What is your current task status?
flow.hints: in progress, completed, blocked, not started, testing

flow.text: Are there any blockers or issues? Say none if there are no issues.
flow.hints: none, technical issue, waiting for review, need resources, dependency
today, tomorrow, this week, next week, two weeks

flow.text: Thank you! Your project update has been recorded successfully.
Sorry, I didn't catch that. Please try again.
